title: Ask About Attraction Accessibility
description: A visitor with mobility issues wants to know if the Eiffel Tower is wheelchair accessible.

tasks.description: Identify the attraction (Eiffel Tower) and the specific query (wheelchair accessibility).
Retrieve accessibility information for the Eiffel Tower from the knowledge base.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent finds information stating that elevators provide access to the first and second floors for wheelchair users.

tasks.description: Clearly communicate the accessibility details to the visitor.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately explains which parts of the attraction are accessible.
